sect2.title: RulesMessageValidator
sect2.para:
This validator uses Drools
engine to assert the validator rules. The rules for this validator have their own DSL
Domain Specific Language
in a form of human readable sentences. The rules are listed in a following listing:

simplesect.title: RulesMessageValidator rules
simplesect.programlisting: Message body contains "{string}". Message body equals "{string}".

simplesect.title: Example of RulesMessageValidator configuration
simplesect.programlisting: ... <validator id="fareWellValidator" class="TextMessageValidator"><![CDATA[ Message body contains "Farewell World!". ... ]]></validator> ...
